EnemyInfo.Name: Etecoon (Escape)
EnemyInfo.Description:
There are three movement types (fast, low, stand still). Their positions and speeds are hardcoded into a table. Once the acid rises, the enemy will run faster. If event 0x0F is set, the enemy will run to the right off screen.
; type 0 2 4 $B3:E718 dw 0080, 00A0, 00E8 ; X $B3:E71E dw 00C8, 00C8, 00C8 ; Y $B3:E724 dw E680, E680, E670 ; main asm $B3:E72A dw E556, E582, E5C6 ; instruction $B3:E730 dw FE00, 0280, 0000 ; speed
E670: stand still E680: run back and forth
E556: moving left E582: moving right E5C6: standing still
